post.body: Hope your hands, feet, head, and heart stay warm today.
is so much warmer now that we have plastic on our windows!
wishing that it wasn't so cold and wonderin how the college students walk around in flipflops. craziness.
just made really good eggplant soup! debate watching tonight...
is scared by the depth of the shallowness of americans. still do not want to believe palin is vp elect. WAKE UP PEOPLE.
is starting to try to write a blog again. http://marciavitae.wordpress.com/
contemplating how to get rid of a really bad tan line
is not sure what this thing is and am not sure how i feel about it...
